title: New L3Harris space boss says it’s time to rethink risk tolerance
summary: With China and Russia embracing hypersonic weapons capable of evading U.S. missile shields, the Pentagon is spending billions of dollars on infrared sensor satellites to counter the threat. Kelle Wendling, the new president of L3Harris Technologies’ Space Systems sector, says U.S. programs are not moving as fast as they could be.

title: Head of U.S. Space Force launch operations ‘watching Starship closely’
summary: Brig. Gen. Stephen Purdy was in Boca Chica, Texas, last month visiting Starship manufacturing and testing operations.

title: Space industry struggling to attract more skilled workers
summary: While the space industry workforce continues to increase, there are signs the industry may be struggling to attract people, which could stifle its long-term growth.

title: Xplore acquires Kubos and Major Tom software
summary: Xplore Inc. announced the acquisition April 4 of spacecraft software developer Kubos Corp. including Major Tom, Kubos’ flight control software platform.

title: Space investors predict more acquisitions to combat hiring challenges
summary: Hiring challenges in the space industry will lead to more acquisitions as way for companies to access talent and expand their workforces, investors said during an April 4 space finance session at the 37th Space Symposium.
